content.value:
Super well located in Zona G in a very silent street, just two blocks for restaurants, bars and entertainment. Beautiful, clear, clean, very cool. Delicious beds! Incredible atmosphere. Very good services and safe area day and night.

And the best is deal cost benefit, you are in a very nice neighborhood for a very good price. It gives you a place to meet new people, program yourself with nice plans to do in the city and relax in an environment that offers privacy but has shared moments.

We speak Spanish, English, french, Italian and Portuguese

We offer spaces to give you the best stay in the city.Â From private places inside the Hostel, to facilities for sharing experiences, rest and meet other travelers from all around the globe.

description.description: Located on a quiet street in the G Zone, one of the most recognized places due to it's wide and exquisite gastronomic offer, and a central location surrounded by interesting places for tourists and local people.
